title: pdftextclusteR: detect text clusters in PDF files
text: dbscan package used detect clusters. package supports four different algorithms: dbscan: default algorithm, generally provides good results jpclust: Jarvis-Patrick clustering algorithm sNNclust: Shared nearest neighbor clustering hdbscan: Hierarchical DBSCAN algorithm different parameters can tuned optimal results:
code: # Example with sNNclust algorithm ka[[7]] |>    pdf_detect_clusters(algorithm = "sNNclust", k = 5, eps = 2, minPts = 3) |>    pdf_plot_clusters() #> ℹ Clusters detected and renumbered: 5 on this page. # Example with hdbscan algorithm ka[[7]] |>    pdf_detect_clusters(algorithm = "hdbscan", minPts = 2) |>    pdf_plot_clusters() #> ℹ Clusters detected and renumbered: 6 on this page.

title: pdftextclusteR: detect text clusters in PDF files
text: pdftextclusteR package provides robust solution extracting text PDFs complex layouts, multiple columns text boxes. using density-based spatial clustering algorithms, can accurately identify text blocks belong together, making suitable various text analysis tasks. Key features: Support multiple clustering algorithms Processing single pages entire documents Visualization detected clusters Extraction text clusters word count statistics Progress tracking multi-page documents details specific functions parameters, refer package documentation.

title: Detecting Text Clusters in PDF Documents Using Density-Based Clustering Algorithms
text: pdftools package available importing PDF files. However, package work optimally importing PDF files multiple columns text boxes. Since pdftools::pdf_text() function pdftools package processes text line line, often fails maintain context text. result, output may contain sentences unrelated fragments text different parts page. Words placed correct context unsuitable text analysis. However, words grouped clusters package using Density-Based Spatial Clustering algorithm likely contextually related thus suitable text analysis. package directly utilizes clustering algorithms implemented dbscan package. See vignette("pdftextclusteR") information usage package.
